pullRequest.title: Fixing UIConfig, and TableDisplay usage
pullRequest.bodyText: Fixing the config field retrieval so state changes don't have lasting impacts. Updating the UI to make sure the correct descriptor is used.

commit.message: Fix: Fixing the config field retrieval so state changes don't have lasting impacts. Updating the UI to make sure the correct descriptor is used.

nodes.bodyText: For User's that have READONLY access we were changing the state of the fields. This change was being persisted even when you switched user's. So now we create a copy of the list to prevent the changes from effecting the in memory fields.
Should this return an empty object? from the function name, I imagine this should return at least the original model without defaults.
The lines Paulo mentioned above is used through out the PR. The new function can be used here as well
I'll just mark them all for you

commit.message: Fix: Fixing the config fields for the Descriptor metadata. Refactoring the descriptor lookup in the javascript.
